title: One year after Hong Kong's national security law, residents feel Beijing's tightening grip
content:
1. One year after Hong Kong's national security law, residents feel Beijing's tightening grip  CNN
  2. Hong Kong security law has ‘decimated’ freedoms: Amnesty  Al Jazeera English
  3. Graphic: In one year, Hong Kong arrests 117 people under new security law  Reuters
  4. China Tames Hong Kong, a Window to Democracy and the Free Flow of Information  Bloomberg
  5. Opinion | China forces Hong Kong newspaper Apple Daily to close. But its ideas won't be so easily silenced.  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 香港の国家安全法から1年、住民は北京の締め付けを感じている
香港国家安全法实施一年后，居民感觉到北京的控制力在加强
香港國家安全法實施一年後，居民感覺到北京的控制力在加強
